title: re-start
author: re-start
content: What happened:Well, this is an obvious scam project. Currently, there is only one active plan (Bronze) on this Russian website: 110% after 24 hours. Just look at the design of this site. (Forget 110% after 24 hours) The format of this website is completely similar to other websites like: cybervit.net, trxnext.net, mabetex.biz, and niobi.club.Reference Link:https://elaborate.live/Technical info:Registration date: 7 Aug 2022 (7 days and 18 hours ago)Expiration date: 7 Aug 2023 (in 11 months and 23 days)Hosted by:   Ddos-Guard Ltd.Server location: Russian (185.149.120.21)Payment Method: Perfect Money, Litecoin, Dogecoin, Tether, Tron, Binance CoinArchive:https://archive.ph/3idlHQuote More information:Domain: elaborate.liveUI frameworks: jQuery UI iconjQuery UICharting: Highcharts iconHighchartsInstant messaging: Telegram (https://t.me/elaborate1 / https://t.me/s/elaborate12)Widgets: Google TranslateAlexa Rank: 5,128,788Registrar Abuse Contact Phone: +1.9854014545

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: re-start on August 15, 2022, 12:12:22 PMWhat happened:Well, this is an obvious scam project. Currently, there is only one active plan (Bronze) on this Russian website: 110% after 24 hours. Just look at the design of this site. (Forget 110% after 24 hours) The format of this website is completely similar to other websites like: cybervit.net, trxnext.net, mabetex.biz, and niobi.club.All the other sites you've mentioned that look similar to Elaborate.live are all offline now, obviously, these sites are already reported or tag as scam sites and they are setting a new one, Ponzi scheme operators are like that they always leave something similar to the one they take down because they are using the same script over and over again, and some parts they cannot change or configure, its good that you screenshot it.

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: Quote from: re-start on August 15, 2022, 12:12:22 PMThe format of this website is completely similar to other websites like: cybervit.net, trxnext.net, mabetex.biz, and niobi.club.Quote from: coin-investor on August 15, 2022, 11:07:20 PMAll the other sites you've mentioned that look similar to Elaborate.live are all offline now,For those who might be interested in checking the similarities between them, here are the archived versions for two of those: mabetex.biz and cybervit.netFound two other "active" websites with similar content:new-investments.pw [archived - Creation Date: 2021-11-29]blitz3.profitscripts.click [archived - Creation Date: 2022-06-12]- I think this one it's just a demo!

comments.author: re-start
comments.body: Quote from: SFR10 on August 16, 2022, 07:28:07 AMFound two other "active" websites with similar content:new-investments.pw [archived - Creation Date: 2021-11-29]blitz3.profitscripts.click [archived - Creation Date: 2022-06-12]- I think this one it's just a demo!Thanks. I've looked at these projects and I can see that the format of these sites is quite similar.Of course, most of them are only active for 3 or 4 days and then they become a scam project.

comments.author: fortunecrypto
comments.body: Quote from: re-start on August 16, 2022, 01:10:41 PMQuote from: SFR10 on August 16, 2022, 07:28:07 AMFound two other "active" websites with similar content:new-investments.pw [archived - Creation Date: 2021-11-29]blitz3.profitscripts.click [archived - Creation Date: 2022-06-12]- I think this one it's just a demo!Thanks. I've looked at these projects and I can see that the format of these sites is quite similar.Of course, most of them are only active for 3 or 4 days and then they become a scam project.If we all noticed they are using not-so-popular domains I have this feeling that they bought these domains in bulk so they can get a huge discount and using the same script over and over again, they cannot afford to spend a huge amount of money because they can easily get busted, so they run 3 days to several weeks or when they are on profit.People should stick to the basics to avoid getting scammed,  avoid 5 to 10% and you will be safe and check the business model and see where they are getting their profit.

comments.author: Taskford
comments.body: Quote from: fortunecrypto on August 17, 2022, 09:19:38 AMQuote from: re-start on August 16, 2022, 01:10:41 PMQuote from: SFR10 on August 16, 2022, 07:28:07 AMFound two other "active" websites with similar content:new-investments.pw [archived - Creation Date: 2021-11-29]blitz3.profitscripts.click [archived - Creation Date: 2022-06-12]- I think this one it's just a demo!Thanks. I've looked at these projects and I can see that the format of these sites is quite similar.Of course, most of them are only active for 3 or 4 days and then they become a scam project.If we all noticed they are using not-so-popular domains I have this feeling that they bought these domains in bulk so they can get a huge discount and using the same script over and over again, they cannot afford to spend a huge amount of money because they can easily get busted, so they run 3 days to several weeks or when they are on profit.People should stick to the basics to avoid getting scammed,  avoid 5 to 10% and you will be safe and check the business model and see where they are getting their profit.This maybe the real score happened to that so they can get it cheap as well they can create more back up sites once they shutdown the other when they are successful scamming their victims. This is repeatable scheme which they use for long years so we need to avoid this to evade getting scams by these type of scammers. Those platforms who promise to give returns without us exerting any efforts are 100% scam.
